special_abilities.desc: The crab can breathe air and water.
special_abilities.name: Amphibious

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 11). The crab has two claws, each of which can grapple only one target.
actions.name: Claw
